ygData.subject: For the roleplayers
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a bit off topic here but I m hoping that by now you all have heard of the Foreverquest Project, devoted to bringing rp elements to eq by means of the
ygData.messageBody:
Just a bit off topic here but I'm hoping that by now you all have heard of the Foreverquest Project, devoted to bringing rp elements to eq by means of the Heartstone Saga.
The reason I am sending this is in hopes that the bards on this list can help if in no more then spreading the word or watching and recording what goes forth.
If you are interested in learning more please follow one of the links below.
Remember we are the true loreweavers, it is up to us to push the world around us into action.

www.foreverquest.org -- fennin ro site the main foreverquest page with newslinks to the other server sites.

www.rpgdungeon.com/eq/fqp.html -- hot link page to the websites set up by each server as they come on line.

Torenithus Legendmaker
Gentleman Bard of Qeynos
Gaurdian of the Stone

Let he makes the discisions make them wisely!
